articles.title: Is Twitter ready for Europe's new Big Tech rules? EU official says it has work to do - Yahoo News
articles.description: Twitter needs to do more work to fall in line with the European Union's tough new digital rulebook, a top EU official said after overseeing a “stress test...
articles.content:
Twitter needs to do more work to fall in line with the European Union's tough new digital rulebook, a top EU official said after overseeing a stress test of the company's systems in Silicon Valley.
… [+4280 chars]
